venue: Portland Children's Museum, 4015 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221
steps: Arrive at Portland Children's Museum 15 minutes before the activity start time.
Meet in the main entrance where the guide will be present to help families.
Move to the art zone where children can try different sensory materials like clay, watercolors, and sand.
Each child is given a personal art station with a visual guide to help them through the activity.
Parents or guardians are encouraged to assist their children as they explore.
A guided sensory story is available as an interactive session for children to engage with textures and sounds.
safety: Please ensure children are dressed comfortably and aware of boundaries within the venue. Staff is trained to assist in case of any sensory overload.
cost: Free with museum admission ($13 per person, members free)
